net.adamcin.recap.api

Interface Recap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecapImpl

    public interface Recap
    The Recap service serves as the entry point for the sync API. It is responsible for providing configuration for default options and address parameters, and to create RecapSessions for other components to use.
    Version:
    $Id: Recap.java$
    Author:
    madamcin

    • Method Detail

      • initSession

        RecapSession initSession(javax.jcr.Session localJcrSession,
                       RecapAddress address,
                       RecapOptions options)
                         throws RecapSessionException
        Initialize a new RecapSession
        Parameters:
        localJcrSession - a local JCR Session (such as provided by ResourceResolver#adaptTo(Session.class) with appropriate write permissions for the paths that will be synced
        address - connection info for the remote repository
        options - sync options for the session
        Returns:
        a new RecapSession ready for sync
        Throws:
        RecapSessionException - if a connection can not be established to the remote repository

      • getDisplayableUrl

        String getDisplayableUrl(RecapAddress recapAddress)
        Format the address as a displayable URL, incorporating default address parameter values as appropriate
        Parameters:
        recapAddress - the address to be formatted
        Returns:
        a URL identifying the address
